name: Project Selene (Farelas)
description:
Know the story of Selene.

A woman who is kidnapped and her only goal is to escape, but on the way she discovers that behind all this lies a darker secret than she could ever have imagined.

A third person survival horror game. Search for key objects, solve puzzles and face dangers in order to escape.

If you want Selene's story to continue, the only way to do it is with the support of the community so that this can grow and be completed.

The game is in a very early stage of development, since this is a prototype that as a developer I made in order to learn and experiment with new technologies and methods. All this to be able to complete and improve the game I'm currently working on: "Unbearable". I invite you to take a look if you liked "Project Selene" since it is a similar experience but longer and more complex.

UNBEARABLE: https://farelas.itch.io/unbearable

Controls:

InputKeyboard/MouseJoystickAimShootRunSHIFTInteractECrouchCInventoryIPauseESCAPE
